snippet: Mireya Belmonte Garcia of Spain was unstoppable on the opening night of the world short-course championships in Doha, Qatar, winning the women’s 200-meter butterfly and 400-meter individual medley in record times.
lead_paragraph: Mireya Belmonte Garcia of Spain was unstoppable on the opening night of the world short-course championships in Doha, Qatar, winning the women’s 200-meter butterfly and 400-meter individual medley in record times.

headline.print_headline: Spain's Garcia breaks 2 records at swim worlds
